scripts.install-foundry: command -v forge >/dev/null 2>&1 || { curl -L https://foundry.paradigm.xyz | bash; foundryup; }
scripts.typechain-generate: forge build --root contracts/eigenlayer && typechain --target ethers-v6 --out-dir typechain contracts/eigenlayer/out/**/*.json
scripts.vercel-build: yarn update-submodules && yarn install-foundry && yarn typechain-generate && yarn build
